inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getUserSshKey.

encoding.description: Specifies the public key encoding format to use in the response. To retrieve the public key in ssh-rsa format, use `SSH`. To retrieve the public key in PEM format, use `PEM`.

sshPublicKeyId.description: Unique identifier for the SSH public key.

username.description: Name of the IAM user associated with the SSH public key.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getUserSshKey.

fingerprint.description: MD5 message digest of the SSH public key.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

status.description: Status of the SSH public key. Active means that the key can be used for authentication with an CodeCommit repository. Inactive means that the key cannot be used.
